title: A New Age
description: A young man, trained since birth in the arts of war; a princess whose powers are awakening; a regent who would be king; a queen who would be an empress; a dark priesthood of mages; and the mind of a god, revealed in the Book of One.In this new epic fantasy series by Jordan Baker, a tale of magic unfolds for Aaron, a mysterious young man, who is plagued by terrible headaches that are somehow linked to magic. Raised in the middle of nowhere, where he was taught to be an expert swordsman, Aaron finds his life irreversibly changed by events that send him on a journey to discover his true destiny.
author: Jordan  Baker
